params.tag_line: A Blog liked by Tech enthusiasts
params.about_text: A freelance Front-end Developer with a experience of over 4 projects. I love programming, writing, speaking and traveling. I do not love talking about myself in the 3rd person. Software Engineer/Technology blogger looking for challenging problems to solve. My background is in enterprise software development, however, I have an insatiable curiosity for AI (particularly deep learning) applications and their potential to change the technology landscape.
